schemes.ObjectOfIssue:
The Company proposes to utilize the Net Proceeds towards funding the following objects:

  1. Funding expenditure towards setting up 12 new stores in Maharashtra (New Stores);
  2. Repayment or pre-payment, in full or part, of certain borrowings availed by the Company; and
  3. General corporate purposes.
Risk: Poor management or growth strategies could harm store performance and stability.
Intense competition challenges P N Gadgil Jewellers' market share and profitability.
Lack of ownership of the "PNG" trademark limits branding flexibility.
Heavy reliance on Maharashtra stores risks business and financial stability.
Strength: P N Gadgil Jewellers offers diverse jewelry designs across 33 stores.
P N Gadgil Jewellers targets growth by expanding into smaller cities.
P N Gadgil Jewellers offers 38,000+ SKUs across diverse customer preferences.
Experienced management drives strong financial growth and operational efficiency improvements.
schemes.companyDescription:
P N Gadgil Jewellers Limited, established in 2013, offers a diverse range of precious metal and jewelry products, including gold, silver, platinum, and diamond jewelry under the brand name "PNG" in various designs and price ranges.**

As of December 31, 2023, the company featured eight sub-brands for gold jewelry collections catering to different occasions: Saptam, Swarajya, Rings of Love, The Golden Katha of Craftmanship, Flip, Litestyle, Pratha, and Yoddha. Additionally, it offers two sub-brands for diamond jewelryâ€”Eiina and PNG Solitaireâ€”and two for platinum jewelryâ€”Men of Platinum and Evergreen Love. Customers can also opt for custom-made jewelry.

By December 31, 2023, P N Gadgil Jewellers had expanded to 33 stores, including 32 locations across 18 cities in Maharashtra and Goa, and one store in the US, with a total retail space of approximately 95,885 sq. ft. All stores are company-managed, with 23 owned by the company and 10 operated under the FOCO (franchisee-owned and company-operated) model. The stores vary in size, with 19 large format (2,500 sq. ft. or more), 11 medium format (1,000â€“2,500 sq. ft.), and 3 small format (under 1,000 sq. ft.).

As of September 30, 2023, the company employed 1,152 people.
